title: League crash
body: why does my league keep crashing when i go into ranked champ select. Never happens when I go into norms champ select. Is it coincidence? League trying to make me lose lp and go back to bronze??

replies.body:
Ranked, or really any draft mode requires an especially steady connection in champ select due to how many simultaneous actions it has to sync up and display. Because it's likely this is caused by an unstable connection to the server, I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are fine.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
